name: Gladiator Glory
description:
Captain's log, day ???: Every day it's the same thing, fight and win, fight and win. These... creatures are despicable. They've force us to attack each other in suits of armor like it's some kind of sport! If you win, you have to lower your weapon range, and try even harder to win the next. Survive three rounds, and you get to fight another day. Lose those rounds... I won't give up that easily, I'll find my glory, until they let me out.

Gameplay:

This is a third person strategic combat game set in the Roman age of Gladiators! 

You weapons downgrade every time you win a round, until you ultimately win a knife fight!!
